entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
